content.question: Which of the following solutions would help decrease flood frequencies and flood sizes that are caused by urbanization?

choices.label: Using new, more permeable materials for roads and sidewalks
Filling nearby wetlands to reduce the amount of water in an area
Encouraging construction of housing developments outward into nearby suburban and rural areas
Installing new, more energy-efficient appliances in existing apartment buildings

content.answer: Using new, more permeable materials for roads and sidewalks

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
